dmca.title: USA Today pictures on infringing website
dmca.body:
October 17, 2005

To:	Google Inc.
Attn: User Support/DMCA Complaints 1600 Ampitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

From: Morgan Carlisle

Re:	Copyright Violation

In searching Google Images, there is an image from an article about me at www.usatoday.com/careers/dream/dream033.htm that appears. When you type in my name in Google Image search, the image comes up on page two and is labeled masa1.jpg.The photo was given to USA Today by me exclusively for use in the article and was not to be copied to any other web page. I have no shared licensing agreements with USA Today and USA Today has no agreements with your company. The image needs to be removed immediately.

I have a good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law. I swear under penalty of perjury consistent with USC Code Title 17 Sec 512 that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner.

Thank you for your attention in this matter. 

Sincerely,
Morgan Carlisle 
morgansmassage@hotmail.com
